participant_1.background:
I am a healthy person, except for my love of milk.
i am on my way to uc santa cruz where i was accepted.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
i noticed i m very talented for this sport.
I enjoy racing go karts and driving my classic car.

participant_2.background:
I was nervous when I first started writing my own songs, but I'm glad I did it.
I grew up in the Midwest, where I learned to love sports.
I collect interesting rocks that I find along my wheelchair paths.
I am happily married to a retired engineer who enjoys spending time with our cats and traveling.
I spent my last birthday watching The Walking Dead and writing a short story about it.

content.text: Hi there! I'm on my way to UC Santa Cruz where I was accepted. I'm excited to start my new life there!
Welcome to California! I've lived in the Midwest my whole life, and I'm always excited to meet new people from different parts of the country.
Thanks! I'm actually from the Midwest too, but I've always wanted to live in California.
What made you want to move to California?
I've always loved the beach and the weather. I also love the mountains, and California has some of the best skiing in the country.
That's true! I love skiing in Mammoth Lakes.
I've never been there, but I've heard great things about it.
It's beautiful! You should definitely go sometime.
I will! Thanks for the tip.
No problem! So, what are you looking forward to most about going to UC Santa Cruz?
I'm looking forward to meeting new people, learning new things, and experiencing all that California has to offer.
Sounds like you're going to have a great time.
Well, I'm sure I'll see you around sometime.
